p: Although the use of BC as a drug delivery system and EOs as natural antimicrobial agents have recently attracted much interest there is a lack of reports describing the possibility of combining the favorable features of both of them to fight bone biofilm. Therefore, the aim of the current study was to combine BC and EOs (obtained from cloves, eucalyptus, thyme) into prototypical dressing designed to eradicate biofilm from hydroxyapatite (main inorganic bone component) in vitro.
